description: Theta series of quadratic form with Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 0; 1, 2, 1; 0, 1, 3 ].
comments: The Gram matrix [ 2, 1, 1; 1, 2, 1; 1, 1, 3 ] defines the same lattice.This is the trigonal R lattice (the classical holotype) of dimension 3.
links: John Cannon, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..9999
G. Nebe and N. J. A. Sloane, Home page for this lattice
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
